article_title: Unwinding Technology Obligations When Strategic Alliances Falter
article_text: Companies embarking on strategic partnership should view any agreement as the equivalent of a pre-nuptial agreement with expectations concerning source code ownership and elements of technology spelled out in advance, say Guest Columnists Richard Raysman and Francesca Morris, partners with Holland & Knight LLP.
